long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
App (extention) helps user to manage a lot of openned tabs with jira tasks (System for manage projects)

ctrl-shift-f, enter task number, select project (if needed), Enter

main features:
- ctrl-shift-f - open extentions with list of tasks
- Extention shows short info about all tasks from openned tabs
- You can search task by title, key, assigner, reporter, status fields of task (enter after search - go to first task from search list)
- You can open new tab with task by task number
- Close tabs by mask (search, select and close)
- tasks are ordered by recently updated
